entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing before morning. Wind becoming south 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind south 20 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 29 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 28 February 2023
